kp3:0.2_0: I honestly took possession of the Tissa.
kp3:1.1_0: “In this body there is head hair, body hair, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidneys, heart, liver, diaphragm, spleen, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, brain, bile, phlegm, pus, blood, sweat, fat, tears, grease, saliva, snot, synovial fluid, urine.”
kp3:2.1_0: head hair, body hair, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, and bones,
kp3:2.3_0: on the edge of the heart,
